data.title: Direct bank transfer
data.description: Make your payment directly into our bank account. Please use your Order ID as the payment reference. Your order will not be shipped until the funds have cleared in our account.
data.method_description: Take payments in person via BACS. More commonly known as direct bank/wire transfer.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

instructions.label: Instructions
instructions.description: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page and emails.
instructions.tip: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page and emails.

data.title: Check payments
data.description: Please send a check to Store Name, Store Street, Store Town, Store State / County, Store Postcode.
data.method_description: Take payments in person via checks. This offline gateway can also be useful to test purchases.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

instructions.label: Instructions
instructions.description: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page and emails.
instructions.tip: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page and emails.

data.title: Cash on delivery
data.method_description: Have your customers pay with cash (or by other means) upon delivery.

title.label: Title
title.description: Payment method description that the customer will see on your checkout.
title.tip: Payment method description that the customer will see on your checkout.

instructions.label: Instructions
instructions.description: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page.
instructions.tip: Instructions that will be added to the thank you page.

enable_for_methods.label: Enable for shipping methods
enable_for_methods.description: If COD is only available for certain methods, set it up here. Leave blank to enable for all methods.
enable_for_methods.tip: If COD is only available for certain methods, set it up here. Leave blank to enable for all methods.

enable_for_virtual.label: Accept COD if the order is virtual

data.title: PayPal
data.description: Pay via PayPal; you can pay with your credit card if you don't have a PayPal account.
data.method_description: PayPal Standard redirects customers to PayPal to enter their payment information.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

email.label: PayPal email
email.description: Please enter your PayPal email address; this is needed in order to take payment.
email.tip: Please enter your PayPal email address; this is needed in order to take payment.

testmode.label: Enable PayPal sandbox
testmode.description: PayPal sandbox can be used to test payments. Sign up for a developer account.
testmode.tip: PayPal sandbox can be used to test payments. Sign up for a developer account.

debug.label: Enable logging
debug.description: Log PayPal events, such as IPN requests, inside /srv/htdocs/wp-content/uploads/wc-logs/paypal-2021-10-12-a073abfa22625b1095b2b80374d447c2.log Note: this may log personal information. We recommend using this for debugging purposes only and deleting the logs when finished.
debug.tip: Log PayPal events, such as IPN requests, inside /srv/htdocs/wp-content/uploads/wc-logs/paypal-2021-10-12-a073abfa22625b1095b2b80374d447c2.log Note: this may log personal information. We recommend using this for debugging purposes only and deleting the logs when finished.

ipn_notification.label: Enable IPN email notifications
ipn_notification.description: Send notifications when an IPN is received from PayPal indicating refunds, chargebacks and cancellations.
ipn_notification.tip: Send notifications when an IPN is received from PayPal indicating refunds, chargebacks and cancellations.

receiver_email.label: Receiver email
receiver_email.description: If your main PayPal email differs from the PayPal email entered above, input your main receiver email for your PayPal account here. This is used to validate IPN requests.
receiver_email.tip: If your main PayPal email differs from the PayPal email entered above, input your main receiver email for your PayPal account here. This is used to validate IPN requests.

identity_token.label: PayPal identity token
identity_token.description: Optionally enable "Payment Data Transfer" (Profile > Profile and Settings > My Selling Tools > Website Preferences) and then copy your identity token here. This will allow payments to be verified without the need for PayPal IPN.
identity_token.tip: Optionally enable "Payment Data Transfer" (Profile > Profile and Settings > My Selling Tools > Website Preferences) and then copy your identity token here. This will allow payments to be verified without the need for PayPal IPN.

invoice_prefix.label: Invoice prefix
invoice_prefix.description: Please enter a prefix for your invoice numbers. If you use your PayPal account for multiple stores ensure this prefix is unique as PayPal will not allow orders with the same invoice number.
invoice_prefix.tip: Please enter a prefix for your invoice numbers. If you use your PayPal account for multiple stores ensure this prefix is unique as PayPal will not allow orders with the same invoice number.

send_shipping.label: Send shipping details to PayPal instead of billing.
send_shipping.description: PayPal allows us to send one address. If you are using PayPal for shipping labels you may prefer to send the shipping address rather than billing. Turning this option off may prevent PayPal Seller protection from applying.
send_shipping.tip: PayPal allows us to send one address. If you are using PayPal for shipping labels you may prefer to send the shipping address rather than billing. Turning this option off may prevent PayPal Seller protection from applying.

address_override.label: Enable "address_override" to prevent address information from being changed.
address_override.description: PayPal verifies addresses therefore this setting can cause errors (we recommend keeping it disabled).
address_override.tip: PayPal verifies addresses therefore this setting can cause errors (we recommend keeping it disabled).

paymentaction.label: Payment action
paymentaction.description: Choose whether you wish to capture funds immediately or authorize payment only.
paymentaction.tip: Choose whether you wish to capture funds immediately or authorize payment only.

image_url.label: Image url
image_url.description: Optionally enter the URL to a 150x50px image displayed as your logo in the upper left corner of the PayPal checkout pages.
image_url.tip: Optionally enter the URL to a 150x50px image displayed as your logo in the upper left corner of the PayPal checkout pages.

api_details.label: API credentials
api_details.description: Enter your PayPal API credentials to process refunds via PayPal. Learn how to access your PayPal API Credentials.
api_details.tip: Enter your PayPal API credentials to process refunds via PayPal. Learn how to access your PayPal API Credentials.

api_username.label: Live API username
api_username.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
api_username.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

api_password.label: Live API password
api_password.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
api_password.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

api_signature.label: Live API signature
api_signature.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
api_signature.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

sandbox_api_username.label: Sandbox API username
sandbox_api_username.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
sandbox_api_username.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

sandbox_api_password.label: Sandbox API password
sandbox_api_password.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
sandbox_api_password.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

sandbox_api_signature.label: Sandbox API signature
sandbox_api_signature.description: Get your API credentials from PayPal.
sandbox_api_signature.tip: Get your API credentials from PayPal.

data.title: Credit Card (Stripe)
data.description: Pay with your credit card via Stripe.
data.method_description: Stripe works by adding payment fields on the checkout and then sending the details to Stripe for verification.

title.label: Title
title.description: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.
title.tip: This controls the title which the user sees during checkout.

testmode.label: Enable Test Mode
testmode.description: Place the payment gateway in test mode using test API keys.
testmode.tip: Place the payment gateway in test mode using test API keys.

test_publishable_key.label: Test Publishable Key
test_publishable_key.description: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "pk_test_" will be saved.
test_publishable_key.tip: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "pk_test_" will be saved.

test_secret_key.label: Test Secret Key
test_secret_key.description: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "sk_test_" or "rk_test_" will be saved.
test_secret_key.tip: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "sk_test_" or "rk_test_" will be saved.

publishable_key.label: Live Publishable Key
publishable_key.description: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "pk_live_" will be saved.
publishable_key.tip: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "pk_live_" will be saved.

secret_key.label: Live Secret Key
secret_key.description: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "sk_live_" or "rk_live_" will be saved.
secret_key.tip: Get your API keys from your stripe account. Invalid values will be rejected. Only values starting with "sk_live_" or "rk_live_" will be saved.

webhook.label: Webhook Endpoints
webhook.description:
You must add the following webhook endpoint  https://automatticwidgets.wpcomstaging.com/?wc-api=wc_stripe  to your Stripe account settings (if there isn't one already enabled). This will enable you to receive notifications on the charge statuses.

No test webhooks have been received since monitoring began at 2021-03-17 15:43:22 UTC.
webhook.tip:
You must add the following webhook endpoint  https://automatticwidgets.wpcomstaging.com/?wc-api=wc_stripe  to your Stripe account settings (if there isn't one already enabled). This will enable you to receive notifications on the charge statuses.

No test webhooks have been received since monitoring began at 2021-03-17 15:43:22 UTC.

test_webhook_secret.label: Test Webhook Secret
test_webhook_secret.description: Get your webhook signing secret from the webhooks section in your stripe account.
test_webhook_secret.tip: Get your webhook signing secret from the webhooks section in your stripe account.

webhook_secret.label: Webhook Secret
webhook_secret.description: Get your webhook signing secret from the webhooks section in your stripe account.
webhook_secret.tip: Get your webhook signing secret from the webhooks section in your stripe account.

inline_cc_form.label: Inline Credit Card Form
inline_cc_form.description: Choose the style you want to show for your credit card form. When unchecked, the credit card form will display separate credit card number field, expiry date field and cvc field.
inline_cc_form.tip: Choose the style you want to show for your credit card form. When unchecked, the credit card form will display separate credit card number field, expiry date field and cvc field.

statement_descriptor.label: Statement Descriptor
statement_descriptor.description: Statement descriptors are limited to 22 characters, cannot use the special characters >, <, ", \, ', *, /, (, ), {, }, and must not consist solely of numbers. This will appear on your customer's statement in capital letters.
statement_descriptor.tip: Statement descriptors are limited to 22 characters, cannot use the special characters >, <, ", \, ', *, /, (, ), {, }, and must not consist solely of numbers. This will appear on your customer's statement in capital letters.

capture.label: Capture charge immediately
capture.description: Whether or not to immediately capture the charge. When unchecked, the charge issues an authorization and will need to be captured later. Uncaptured charges expire in 7 days.
capture.tip: Whether or not to immediately capture the charge. When unchecked, the charge issues an authorization and will need to be captured later. Uncaptured charges expire in 7 days.

payment_request.label:
Enable Payment Request Buttons. (Apple Pay/Google Pay)
By using Apple Pay, you agree to Stripe and Apple's terms of service. (Apple Pay domain verification is performed automatically in live mode; configuration can be found on the Stripe dashboard.)
payment_request.description: If enabled, users will be able to pay using Apple Pay or Chrome Payment Request if supported by the browser.
payment_request.tip: If enabled, users will be able to pay using Apple Pay or Chrome Payment Request if supported by the browser.

payment_request_button_type.label: Button Type
payment_request_button_type.description: Select the button type you would like to show.
payment_request_button_type.tip: Select the button type you would like to show.

payment_request_button_theme.label: Button Theme
payment_request_button_theme.description: Select the button theme you would like to show.
payment_request_button_theme.tip: Select the button theme you would like to show.

payment_request_button_locations.label: Payment Request Button Locations
payment_request_button_locations.description: Select where you would like Payment Request Buttons to be displayed
payment_request_button_locations.tip: Select where you would like Payment Request Buttons to be displayed

payment_request_button_size.label: Payment Request Button Size
payment_request_button_size.description: Select the size of the button.
payment_request_button_size.tip: Select the size of the button.

saved_cards.label: Enable Payment via Saved Cards
saved_cards.description: If enabled, users will be able to pay with a saved card during checkout. Card details are saved on Stripe servers, not on your store.
saved_cards.tip: If enabled, users will be able to pay with a saved card during checkout. Card details are saved on Stripe servers, not on your store.

logging.label: Log debug messages
logging.description: Save debug messages to the WooCommerce System Status log.
logging.tip: Save debug messages to the WooCommerce System Status log.

upe_checkout_experience_enabled.label:
Try the new payment experience (Early access)
Get early access to a new, smarter payment experience on checkout and let us know what you think by submitting your feedback. We recommend this feature for experienced merchants as the functionality is currently limited. Learn more
upe_checkout_experience_enabled.description: New checkout experience allows you to manage all payment methods on one screen and display them to customers based on their currency and location.
upe_checkout_experience_enabled.tip: New checkout experience allows you to manage all payment methods on one screen and display them to customers based on their currency and location.
